IntroductionÔÉÅ

Hypergraph Analysis Tolbox (HAT) is a software suite for analyzing higher order structures. HAT is implemented in Python and Matlab. There are 5 main modules of HAT including:

  1. Visualization

  2. Hypergraph Properties

  3. Controlability

  4. Similarity Measures

  5. Decompositions
